Please pick a name you like - you can't change it later!
Wiz Grump is the grumpiest wizard in all the land... obviously.\n\nGreat at smashing and flinging fireballs but don't take him to parties.

Ever since Adventure Boy was a baby, he dreamed of becoming a hero.\n\nArmed with his trusty sword and speedy little boots, Adventure Boy is on the biggest adventure of his little life... almost as big as his head.

Lazer Girl crash landed into Smash Land many moons ago, she then hyper-traveled backwards into future space while inverting time inside our minds. She now exists in the present... maybe?\n\nLikes big open spaces, speed and pressing buttons.

Princess Pow.

Likes: Fighting fiendish foes, armwrestling and axe grinding

Hates: Vegetables and Romantic comedies.

Lost in the desert for hundreds of years, Mini Mummé is back with vengence.

Her quest is simple... defeat the Skull King and free her land.

She likes gold, loves milk and has the command of the sun. Allergic to cats.

Captain Smash always seems to lose his ship. Last seen, it was stuck in the desert.

Speaking of desert, he loves dessert. Carrot cake is his favorite.

Collects treasure maps and gold teeth.
Yes, he is a wooden barrel with eyes... but don't let that fool you, Buster is jam packed with highly explosive TNT!\n\nUnpredictable and hyperactive, don't leave him in charge of the BBQ!

Elo looks cute but she packs a punch!

This fun loving fairy was raised by mushrooms in a fairytale.

 Always mending broken hearts.

Wow!, now that is a mustache. Zalla Zam is a three thousand year old genie and owns about the same amount of hats. Loves hats, always flinging them around and hiding in them.\n\nAdvice: Never, ever... ever ask for wishes. In fact, don't even think about them... stop it!

Big, bashful, huggable and lives in a cave made of ice cream.

Lumimi lives a simple life and loves sleeping. There is nothing he loves more, than snuggling up in his freezing ice cube bed and drifting off to the sounds of ice shards cracking.

 Professional snowball fighter.

Look a <c3>Princess</c> - lost in the woods. We have to help her!
LOST!? I'm here to take down these nasty critters before they scare my Prince. I'll show you who is lost!

I don't like you very much but I'll tell you what, <c3>hire me</c> and I will help you on your adventure.

<c3>Rank Badge</c> indicates your Multiplayer Rank. Better badge you have the more rewards you get from Multiplayer!
<c3>Diamonds</c> can be used to buy Gold, Energy or speed up time!

You can purchase an XP Booster from the shop to level up faster.
Cancelling your move is easy: just tap the screen with another finger!
Your hero's combo counter takes longer to charge up each time you use it.
Remember to upgrade your heroes to beat the harder levels!
Changing your hero lineup can help you to beat some tough levels!
Your first Multiplayer match of every day does not cost Energy!
Every day, all your heroes can receive a <c3>DAILY WIN BONUS!</c>
By using all your heroes every day you get maximum <c3>XP</c> and <c3>Gold</c> rewards from <c3>DAILY WIN BONUS</c>!
Joining a Team allows you to work together on <c3>Team Goals</c> and gain extra Diamonds!
Chests can reappear on levels that you have already completed!
In the later levels there is rumoured to be a huge mushroom with a moustache.
Look out for Chests on older levels. Its a good way to get extra Gold and XP.
Remember to switch the heroes you use during a match. Sometimes it is a good idea to save your hero's special ability for later in the level!
In Multiplayer you earn gold for every enemy hero you defeat.
Learn to use your heroes' special abilities to maximize your chances of winning!
The Wizard's Fireball deals damage to a big area. You can use it to take down groups of enemies!
The Mummy can take lots of damage. Try to use her to protect your more vulnerable heroes.
Never give out your Game Center password to anyone.
Never give out your Google credentials to anyone.
Supercell employees will never ask you for your Game Center password.
Supercell employees will never ask you for your Google account's password.
Try doing a longer drag when you need extra aiming precision for your shot.
Tap any hero on the playing field to see how close they are to gaining their special ability.
You can view hero stats during the match by tapping and holding on the hero buttons
Changing the order of heroes in the main menu also changes the order they appear on the battlefield
If you tap an enemy critter you can see how long it takes before they attack.
The number next to the enemy critters shows you how long before it attacks!
You can increase your maximum Energy permanently in the shop with Diamonds.
Purchasing a Maximum Energy Increase also refills your energy.
You can purchase Gold from the shop.
If you see an offensive message in the chat, tap it and choose \qReport\q to report the player.
Use chat reporting only when necessary - don't get carried away!
Reach a higher XP Level to unlock new heroes, upgrades and more!
Complete Achievements and Team Goals to earn free Diamonds!
Trophies that you win are deducted from your opponents' Trophies!
Unlock the Pirate and you'll be able to upgrade to the boat and send ship on a Treasure Hunt!
The more you upgrade your ship, the more Gold and XP you'll find from Treasure Hunt!
Silence your Multiplayer opponent by tapping on their speech bubble
Connect to Facebook to compare your progress and highscores with your friends!
Mega Chest rewards are bigger in higher Ranks!
You'll have higher chances to earn Gembits the higher your rank is!
Look out for special events – you might get special rewards!
Team leader & co-leaders can write mail to team members from Mail button!
Dark Gembits are the rarest Gembits in the game, red, blue and green are more common
Spells can change the outcome of a match! Never go to a match unprepared!
The Super Size spell transforms your Hero into a giant who can scatter enemies!
The Ice Cube spell can be used to create obstacles that can block your opponent’s shots!
Freeze spell prevents enemies from using their Special Powers and Abilities for a turn!
While Hero is under Freeze spell their combo counter does not progress!
Heal spell gives small amount of healing to your hero!
Lightning spell is very useful against enemies with shields. Lightning always hits shielded enemies!
Don’t forget to equip your heroes with items!
Items can grant your heroes extra abilities, boost their stats, or even increase your gold and xp rewards!
Some items are upgradeable. Remember to upgrade items in the shop!
Heroes that return from tresure hunt will be unable to sail until ship with new heroes is sent!
